description: A login page for a Next.js application, implementing email/password authentication using Supabase, with a form UI composed of custom components.

methods.name: LoginPage
methods.description: React functional component for the login page, managing form state, handling user login, and UI rendering.

methods.name: handleLogin
methods.description: Async function handling form submission, performing login through Supabase, routing on success, and error handling.
